newsitem.title: INDIA: ACC, CRA in India mining venture.
newsitem.headline: ACC, CRA in India mining venture.

text.p: India's Associated Cement Companies on Friday said it signed a joint venture with Australia's CRA Exploration Pty Ltd to form a joint venture firm for exploration and mining in India.
The new firm called ACC-CRA Exploration Ltd will explore and mine a variety of minerals including gold and diamonds all over India, ACC said in a statement.
It said ACC, apart from being the largest Indian cement manufacturer, is also the largest private mining company handling around 15 million tonnes of rock every year.
